QNA.question: can we accept cash
QNA.short_answer: We do not accept cash receipts. Customer could either pay by bank transfer or cheque to our account.

QNA.question: I would need the WBS numbers for the projects I am working on
QNA.short_answer: You may contact the Finance Partner of your institute for the WBS number

QNA.question: Who is Ms Chan Lai Fung?
QNA.short_answer: Ms Chan Lai Fung is our Chairman. You can refer to our website to know more about her

QNA.question: Who is Mr Frederick Chew?
QNA.short_answer: Mr Frederick Chew is our CEO. You can refer to our website to know more about him

QNA.short_answer: Our CEO is Mr Frederick Chew. You can refer to our website to know more about him

QNA.question: i want to sign an mou
QNA.short_answer: Please contact the relevant legal counsel for your RI/entity/key account. Refer to A*STAR Legal’s work cluster at: https://ku.a-star.edu.sg/Corporate/Legal/AboutUs/LegalWorkCluster.aspx.

QNA.question: Can I dispose assets that are still in working condition?
QNA.answer: All assets that are transferrable and still in good working condition, the disposing Entity shall first offer the asset to the other Reporting Entities. If there are no takers, the assets can then be disposed. Deviations from this policy may be considered on a case-by-case basis by the DED (BMRC/SERC).
QNA.short_answer: Assets that are still in working condition, the disposing Entity shall first offer the asset to other Entities. If there are no takers, the assets can then be disposed.

QNA.question: how do i zip files?
QNA.short_answer: Please do a Right Click on the file to bring up the context menu and Navigate to “Send to” and choose “Compressed (zipped) folder.

QNA.question: what are the standard corporate desktop software offered by ITSS?
QNA.short_answer: Please refer to the ITSS Service Offerings at KU
